title: Why is this game so much worse than WoW?
body: Really disgusting graphic design with unskillful players. Bad player are all around this game. HOWEVER, I do not believe people play badly because of themselves. It is because of the stupid design of the champs and the way that these champs are controlled!!

replies.body:
I don't have enough meme arrows to address this post.

>Really disgusting graphic design with unskillful players.

I'm sorry but World of Warcraft looks worse than a PS2 video game, I mean for %%%%sake, it's 2014 and their game still looks like %%%%. A multi-billion dollar company has %%%%ty graphics. Look at FInal Fantasy: A Realm Reborn, Guild Wars 2, ArcheAge and ELder Scrolls Online, all look amazing graphic wise, and then theirs World of Warcraft, been in the MMORPG business for 10 - 15 and still a %%%% looking MMORPG.

>Bad player are all around this game. 

Just like in all games, please.

>It is because of the stupid design of the champs and the way that these champs are controlled!!

Lmao. Yeah I took your %%%%bait, however I just wanted to trash WoW.

Go stick with WoW if you find that game superior.

Because what you have found bad are all opinions, so in my opinion just go with the game you like more.

> Really disgusting graphic design with unskillful players

Your bronze. Stop talking about people being unskilled and git gud
